name: Serena the Clerical!
description:
Serena the Clerical is a short game about a cleric named Serena that gets
concerned when she doesn't hear from her goddess, Faite, one day. This is the story of her adventure to fix what is wrong and bring joy back to a goddess's life.

*Short gameplay!
*Some more of that humor you know and love.
*Completley free! That's right free!
